title: OgNasty
author: OgNasty
content: Mr Beast makes a joke about Bitcoin in new video. You can see it around the five minute mark in the below link. It’s a lighthearted joke but it still hurts. Lol. Remember it wasn’t too long ago Mr Beast was doing a video with Coinbase and giving away Bitcoin to his fans. Enjoy!Mr Beast - I DIDNT EAT FOOD FOR 30 DAYShttps://youtu.be/vaIgyRoUkQI

comments.author: Charles-Tim
comments.body: A time is coming when it would turn to eating carb food daily with other nutrients needed for weightier body, maybe bitcoin would hit over $100000 by that time.

comments.author: hatshepsut93
comments.body: I have noticed that a lot of people from outside of crypto have been making fun of it recently, something that didn't happen in 2018. This means that a lot more people are aware of crypto these days than before. This mocking from wider public could be somewhat demoralizing to Bitcoiners, but it won't last long, because people will lose interest. And then during the next big bull run Bitcoiners will be laughing at people who are laughing at them now.

comments.author: niceli
comments.body: Lmao, is he wrong tho?  I think it is actually quite good, because it shows that he is following bitcoin  and considering his coinbase deal, I think he probably owns some as well. This dude probably worths tens of millions of dollars and him being interested in bitcoin is not weird neither. He is like 20 something, quite young so for investment he might choose bitcoin. Hence, even though he still has a lot of money, he may have lost some in bitcoin this year, and its a joke showing proof of that.

comments.author: franky1
comments.body: punchline of video, for those that didnt watch:he done a 30day without eating challenge and charted his weight loss and compared the down chart to bitcoin pricesas for those disheartened or thinking its bad news about the price correcting down to value.. the ATH price was never a amount of stable value that should have remained.it was not an amount everyone should have bought in at.. it was one of this cycles BUBBLE high. a temporary blip of absurdly massive speculation above value.. it was a premium too many people think the price should have been at $70k and anything below that as bad..its actually the reverse. the LOW is the important number. going so high so fast so extreme is not a good sign. people shouldnt be buying the high. going high so fast should be the shocking bad news time where people need to stop buying and back away in fear..the correction is a good sign and a good opportunity. the underlying value does rise.. but not to the extent and speed of the speculative temporary bubble ATH'si find it funny how loads of people call it a CRASH or a down market or a recession.. no. its actually a correction from a bubble. being back at value is a good thing. ..imagine the chart like watching the retail price of an iphone depending on the seasons. where it goes stupidly high in peak seasons and discounts in the sales season.. never buy iphone at its peak price. and celebrate when you see the price come down in discount season.yes each years new version of the iphone will be more expensive value than previous.. but never then wait for the peak season premium price to buy it, celebrate the 'on-sale' /discount season to buy oneseeing the price of iphones coming down is a good thing

comments.body: Is the human body strong in 30 days without eating? just to attract the audience including me to capture the screen just to see the joke. Maybe in 2 to 3 days, the body will be weak due to decreased glucose and glycogen production, and the muscles will be like an old grandpa. It's hard to make fun of back when we weren't as rich as Beast but at least for the Bitcoin bull run, we can chuckle in the comments.
